General.Name: Carnival Industrial Corp
General.Description: Carnival Industrial Corporation manufactures and sells apparel in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include suits and career wear for men; womenswear; and dining or homeware products. It offers its own branded and franchised branded products through self-operated stores. The company was formerly known as Carnival Textile Industrial Corp. and changed its name to Carnival Industrial Corporation in 1997. The company was incorporated in 1969 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

1.Name: David  Kuei
1.Title: Sr. Mang. of Fin. & Fin. Director
